colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS AA RA PA TZA NA'I SGRUB THABS SHES RAB KYI BDUD RTZI 'BEBS PA'I NOR BU CHU SHEL CES BYA BA 'DI YANG, DAD PA DANG GTONG BA DANG RNAM DPYOD PHUL DU BYUNG BA'I LUNG RIGS SMRA BA RJE DRUNG DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS NAN CHER BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, CHOS SMRA BA'I CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DBEN GNAS CHOS KYI PHO BRANG GI GTZUG LAG KHANG DU SBYAR BA'O, ,SHU BHA MASTU SARBA DZA GA T'Am, ,LEGS SO, ,)
